name: Unicorn Mayhem
description:
Unicorn Mayhem.

2d Shooter

Tested for WebGL and Windows

Didnt have enough time to change everything.  but made significant changes.  

Changes:

Player - sprites, audio and shooter changes.  beam instead of just shooters.

Enemies - Sprites, audio and shooter changes.  Some enemies dont count towards game wins.  Some dont attack, but attempt to block your path.

Background - Overall changes to sprites and music.  doors unlock when attacked.

Win and loss screen - changed look, feel and music.  story line brought in on screens.

Menu - changed look.

Zip file for Screenshots.  Itch does not display my screenshots

credits:

Wayne van Jaarsveld
